panels.description:
1. Compare the average time spent in each state of a requirement in the last 2 months.
2. The requirements being calculated are the requirements delivered in the last 2 months.

targets.rawSql:
with _requirements as(
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(resolution_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(resolution_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    assignee_name as assignee,
    avg(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as lead_time
  from issues i
  where 
    type = 'REQUIREMENT'
    and assignee_id != ''
    and $__timeFilter(resolution_date)
  group by 1,2
),


this_month as(
	select 
		DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY) as this_month
),

last_month as(
	SELECT 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) as last_month
),

the_month_before_last as(
	SELECT 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) as the_month_before_last
),

this_month_record as(
	SELECT
		assignee,
		lead_time as this_month_count,
		time as this_month
	from _requirements
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT this_month from this_month)
),

last_month_record as(
	SELECT
		assignee,
		lead_time as last_month_count,
		time as last_month
	from _requirements
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT last_month from last_month)
),

the_month_before_last_record as(
	SELECT
		assignee,
		lead_time as the_month_before_last_count,
		time as the_month_before_last
	from _requirements
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT the_month_before_last from the_month_before_last)
)

SELECT
  COALESCE(NULLIF(tmr.assignee,''), NULLIF(lmr.assignee,''), tmblr.assignee) AS 'Assignee',
	COALESCE(tmblr.the_month_before_last_count,0) AS "The Month before Last",
	COALESCE(lmr.last_month_count,0) AS "Last Month",
	COALESCE(tmr.this_month_count,0) AS "This Month",
	case 
	  when lmr.last_month_count is null or tmr.this_month_count is null then '-'
	  else concat(FORMAT(100 * (tmr.this_month_count - lmr.last_month_count)/lmr.last_month_count,1),'%') end as "Changes in last 2 month"
From the_month_before_last_record tmblr 
  left join last_month_record lmr on tmblr.assignee = lmr.assignee
  left join this_month_record tmr on tmblr.assignee = tmr.assignee
order by 2

panels.title: Average Requirement Lead Time by Assignee (day)

targets.rawSql:
with _requirements as(
  select 
    DATE_ADD(date(resolution_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(resolution_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    assignee_name as assignee,
    avg(lead_time_minutes)/1440 as lead_time
  from issues i
  where 
    type = 'REQUIREMENT'
    and assignee_id != ''
    and $__timeFilter(resolution_date)
  group by 1,2
),


this_month as(
	select 
		DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY) as this_month
),

last_month as(
	SELECT 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) as last_month
),

the_month_before_last as(
	SELECT 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) as the_month_before_last
),

this_month_record as(
	SELECT
		assignee,
		lead_time as this_month_count,
		time as this_month
	from _requirements
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT this_month from this_month)
),

last_month_record as(
	SELECT
		assignee,
		lead_time as last_month_count,
		time as last_month
	from _requirements
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT last_month from last_month)
),

the_month_before_last_record as(
	SELECT
		assignee,
		lead_time as the_month_before_last_count,
		time as the_month_before_last
	from _requirements
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT the_month_before_last from the_month_before_last)
)

SELECT
  COALESCE(NULLIF(tmr.assignee,''), NULLIF(lmr.assignee,''), tmblr.assignee) AS 'Assignee',
	COALESCE(tmblr.the_month_before_last_count,0) AS "The Month before Last",
	COALESCE(lmr.last_month_count,0) AS "Last Month",
	COALESCE(tmr.this_month_count,0) AS "This Month",
	case 
	  when lmr.last_month_count is null or tmr.this_month_count is null then '-'
	  else concat(FORMAT(100 * (tmr.this_month_count - lmr.last_month_count)/lmr.last_month_count,1),'%') end as "Changes in last 2 month"
From the_month_before_last_record tmblr 
  left join last_month_record lmr on tmblr.assignee = lmr.assignee
  left join this_month_record tmr on tmblr.assignee = tmr.assignee
order by 2

title: Demo-Average Requirement Lead Time By Assignee
